abstract: Chicago artist Theaster Gates, whose wooden sculptural objects are on display at the Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, describes his love of old wooden ladders.
snippet: Theaster Gates, a Chicago artist, takes wood from old factories and turns it into art — or ladders.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art

lead_paragraph: Theaster Gates, a Chicago artist, takes wood from old factories and turns it into art — or ladders.

headline.main: Finding the Poetry in the Industrial Past
